attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Sets whether the button group is disabled.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: value-field
attrs.desc: Field value of the button value.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is value.

attrs.name: text-field
attrs.desc: Field value of the button displayed text.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is text.

attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Default value of the selected button.

attrs.name: plain
attrs.desc: Indicates whether the button is a simple button.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: show-more
attrs.desc: Set the number of more buttons to be displayed.

attrs.name: show-edit
attrs.desc: Whether to display the edit button. This parameter takes effect only when more buttons are displayed.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: border
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

events.name: edit
events.desc: Set the callback function triggered when the edit button is clicked.

events.name: change
events.desc: Set the callback function triggered when the selected button is changed.
